items.text: shifts back and tucks to midwicket

items.text: advances down the ground and hammers it straight past long-off

items.text: backs away and punches to extra cover

items.text: advances and drives to extra cover

items.text: full outside off, pushed to cover

items.text: full outside off, slaps it to sweeper cover
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Holder, 1 run

items.text: gets down to sweep but it drifts down leg
items.postText: NJ: "Interesting situation, nicely poised, though in favour of Bangladesh, at present. But, Holder has a chance to showcase his all round skills, once more like in the longer-version. Can the Bangla Tigers start ona winning note or the Windies would continue their winning streak ? The next 45 minutes would throw the answers :)."
